
snap(-40,-60,50)
//snap(-33,-50,75)

sky(0,0,50)
fog(0,0,100) 
ground(0,150,008)

fadefrom(7000) 


name(Night Rider) 
nlaps(3) 

set(10,0,0,0)p 
set(10,0,4000,0)p 
set(14,0,8550,0)pt 
chk(40,500,8050,-45) 
set(10,4555,8550,90)p 
set(14,9100,8550,180)pt 
set(14,9100,12050,270)pt 
chk(40,9100,9900,0) 
set(10,4555,12050,90)p 
set(26,5300,12050,90)pr 
fix(41,2000,12050,-1500,90)s 
set(10,1480,12050,90)p
set(10,-3000,12050,90)
chk(40,-4500,12050,90)
 
set(14,-7000,12050,90)pt 
set(10,-7000,16600,0)p 
set(36,-8700,18000,90)ph 
set(10,-7000,20600,0)p 
set(10,-7000,24600,0)p 
set(23,-7000,26600,180)po 
set(27,-7000,26600,0)pr


set(23,-7000,37850,0)po 
set(14,-7000,39600,0)pr 
set(10,-3000,39600,90)p
set(23,-1500,39600,90)po 
chk(40,-6600,39150,-45) 
set(32,-500,39800,-90)pr
set(32,-500,39400,-90)pr 


set(23,7000,39900,270)po
set(10,8000,39900,90)p
chk(40,9000,39900,90)
set(14,12000,39900,180)pt 
set(10,12000,43900,180)p 
set(10,12000,47900,180)p
set(14,12000,51900,-90)pt 
set(14,3000,51900,0)pt 
set(28,8200,51900,90)pr 
set(10,7000,51900,90)p 
chk(40,8200,51900,90)

set(10,3000,47900,180)p 
set(36,1300,47900,90)ph
set(10,3000,43900,180)p 
chk(40,3000,40000,0)
set(10,3000,39900,180)p 
set(14,3000,35900,90)pt 
set(14,6000,35900,-90)pt
set(36,7700,33000,-90)ph
set(10,6000,31900,180)p 
chk(40,6000,30000,0)
set(14,6000,27900,180)pt 
set(14,3000,27900,0)pt 
set(10,3000,23900,180)p
set(36,1300,25000,90)ph
chk(40,3000,21000,0)
set(10,3000,21900,180)p 
set(14,3000,17900,90)pt 
set(10,7000,17900,90)p 
set(22,10000,17900,90) 
set(14,12000,17900,-90)pt 
set(10,12000,13900,180)p 
set(10,12000,9900,180)p 
chk(40,12000,8900,0) 
set(14,12000,5900,180)pt 
set(10,8000,5900,90)p 
set(10,6000,5900,90)p 
set(10,4000,5900,90)p 
set(26,2000,5900,90)pr 
set(26,-2000,5900,-90)pr 
set(10,-4000,5900,90)p 
set(14,-8000,5900,0)pt 
set(10,-8000,1900,180)p 
set(10,-8000,-1900,180)p 
set(14,-8000,-5900,90)pt 
set(10,-4000,-5900,90)p 
chk(40,-4000,-5900,90) 
set(14,0,-5900,180)pt 
set(10,0,-1900,180)p 




maxr(19,14000,-7000) 
maxb(9,-9400,-26800) 
maxl(19,-10200,-7000) 
maxt(9,53800,-26800)
